overview:
Jon is a blogger nicknamed “The Web Tech” due to his knowledge of the web. Jon blogs on average between 2-4 posts per day.

He focuses his attention on web 2.0 ideas and current Web related news, and web applications.

He is a young web developer who started making websites at age 8 since then he focuses on becoming better and better at it while trying to get others to follow his belief that web design is an art.

Jon is also well known for creating a Math calculator program which can solve almost any math problem and display step by step instructions on how to do so. This program is called Formula Conqueror.
